item.title: Palworld ‘Tides of Terraria’ update launches June 25
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/palworld-tides-of-terraria-update-launches-june-25

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Animated trailer released.

The Terraria collaboration update for the Early Access release of open-world survival crafting game Palworld, dubbed “Tides of Terraria,” will launch on June 25, developer Pocketpair announced.

Here are the latest details, via Pocketpair:

Animated Trailer

In the collaboration animated trailer, Palworld characters explore a dungeon and obtain the Terraria weapon, the Terra Blade. Also appearing are the Eye of Cthulhu and a silhouette that appears to be the final boss, the Moon Lord. The footage suggests that deadly enemies await at the end of this exciting adventure in the world of Terraria.

About the Update

“Tides of Terraria” is a major update that introduces a collaboration with the adventure game Terraria, which has sold over 60 million copies worldwide.

The world of Terraria collides with Palworld!

Capture, train, fight, and work monsters from Terraria just like Pals…?

A large update that can be enjoyed by fans of Palworld and Terraria!

In addition to the collaboration content, further new content will be added, including new Pals and new islands.

The contents of the update will be announced across official Palworld social media channels over the next few weeks, so please follow!

In addition, Palworld is currently on sale at 25 percent off on Steam and PlayStation Store. Don’t miss this chance to purchase it.

Palworld is available now in Early Access for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store. It is also available via Game Pass.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Lies of P sales top three million
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/lies-of-p-sales-top-three-million

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Over seven million players.

Total worldwide sales for Lies of P have surpassed three million units, publisher NEOWIZ and developer Round8 Studio announced.

Lies of P launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC via Steam and Microsoft Store, and Mac via Mac App Store on September 19, 2023, and sold over one million units in less than a month—with over 90 percent of sales outside of South Korea. Within five months, it surpassed seven million players when including subscription services like Game Pass. A major downloadable content expansion, “Overture,” launched on June 6, 2025.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Neowiz:

Inspired by the familiar story of Pinocchio, Lies of P is an action Soulslike game set in the dark, Belle Epoque-inspired city of Krat. Once a beautiful city, Krat has become a living nightmare as deadly puppets run amok and a plague sweeps the land. Play as a puppet who must fight his way through the city on his unrelenting journey to find Geppetto and finally become human. Lies of P presents an elegant world filled with tension, deep combat and character customization systems, and a gripping story with interesting narrative choices where the more lies told, the more human P becomes. Just remember: in a world filled with lies, no one can be trusted…
